</current-package>

<ls ok="true" cwd="$ROOT/internal/gotypes">
$ ls -1p

gotypes.go
gotypes_ext_test.go
gotypes_test.go
testdata/
</ls>

<pkg-map type="non-tests">
// doc.go:
package gotypes
// gotypes.go:
package gotypes
import (
	"fmt"
	"github.com/codalotl/codalotl/internal/gocode"
	"go/types"
	"os"
	"strings"
	"golang.org/x/tools/go/packages"
)
type TypeInfo struct {
	Info types.Info
}
func LoadTypeInfoInto(pkg *gocode.Package, includeTests bool) (*TypeInfo, error)
</pkg-map>

elided; limited to 25 lines for tests
</pkg-map>

</used-by>

<diagnostics-status ok="true" message="build succeeded">
$ go build -o /dev/null ./internal/gotypes
</diagnostics-status>

<test-status ok="true">
$ go test ./internal/gotypes

</test-status>

<lint-status ok="true" message="no issues found">
$ gofmt -l internal/gotypes
</lint-status>

Reminder: all file paths you send to tools **must be relative to the sandbox dir ($ROOT)** - NOT relative to the package dir.
